Bingo

Delightful templates for web repositories.
Learn More Run the CLI View on GitHub

Creation from Templates

Create fully-formed, ready-to-use repositories with a single command from templates of your choosing.

Flexible Options

Predictable Migrations

Keep your repositories up-to-date with automated migrations ‚Äî including preserving template customizations.

Rich Templating

Define templates as straightforward as Handlebars folders or as nuanced as individually configurable blocks. It‚Äôs up to you.
